name: HOME
title: GEEC GRACE
description: Worship Minister at Grace Ethiopian evangelical church

name: ABOUT
title: ABOUT
description: The purpose of Grace Ethiopian Evangelical Church (GEEC) is to introduce people to the saving grace of the Lord Jesus Christ. We are a community of believers drawn by the grace of the Lord to the fellowship of Christ through faith in what Jesus Christ has done on the cross for each one of us. We strive to get deeply rooted in the knowledge of the eternal Word of God and live out God's Word in our lives.

name: THE CHURCH
title: THE CHURCH
description: Church located in the municipality of La Jarrie, built in the 12th century.
